title: Solid State Electronic Devices 7th ed 2015 by Ben Streetman
description: COVER: http://i.imgur.com/5HseadD.jpg TITLE: Solid State Electronic Devices, 7th edition (2015) AUTHOR: Ben G. Streetman, Sanjay Kumar Banerjee ISBN-13: 9780133356038 BOOK SPECS: https://www.pearson.com/us/higher-education/program/PGM168409.html FILE SPECS: true PDF, logical page numbers as in the print version, bookmarks, 10 MB READERSHIP: undergraduate electrical engineering students or for practicing engineers and scientists interested in updating their understanding of modern electronics DESCRIPTION: One of the most widely used introductory books on semiconductor materials, physics, devices and technology, "Solid State Electronic Devices" aims to: 1) develop basic semiconductor physics concepts, so students can better understand current and future devices; and 2) provide a sound understanding of current semiconductor devices and technology, so that their applications to electronic and optoelectronic circuits and systems can be appreciated. Students are brought to a level of understanding that will enable them to read much of the current literature on new devices and applications. BRIEF CONTENTS: --------------- 1. Crystal Properties and Growth of Semiconductors 2. Atoms and Electrons 3. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers in Semiconductors 4. Excess Carriers in Semiconductors 5. Junctions 6. Field-Effect Transistors 7. Bipolar Junction Transistors 8. Optoelectronic Devices 9. Integrated Circuits 10. High-Frequency, High-Power and Nanoelectronic Devices appendixes answers index ******************** 7th INTERNATIONAL ed 2016 ********************** https://btdb.to/torrent/n1pEZwwlMXt5YmZbGDa9Fqg5J7xzZ6szEo.html
